title: LEGO Friends Heartlake City Pet Center 41345 Building Kit (474 Pieces)
features: Build a 2-level pet center with pet shop, vet clinic and grooming parlor, plus and grooming van
Includes Stephanie, Mia and Liam mini-doll figures, plus 5 animal figures
Pet Center measures over 5” (14cm) high, 9” (25cm) wide and 2” (7cm) deep. Grooming van measures over 1” (4cm) high, 2” (7cm) long and 1” (3cm) wide
474 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 6 and 12 and for fans and kids of all ages
LEGO Friends building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
description: LEGO Friends 41345 Heartlake City Pet Center features a pet shop selling animal food, accessories and fish, while upstairs there’s a vet clinic with an examination table, scales and a sleeping area. There’s also a small animal playground with a seesaw and a pet grooming parlor, along with a vehicle for mobile grooming services. This great LEGO Friends set includes 3 mini-doll figures and 5 animal figures.
